TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigExcC14NTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: Represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), without comments.

span.span: Represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), without comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表獨佔 C14N XML 規範化轉換沒有註解。The class represents the exclusive C14N XML canonicalization transform without comments. 這個類別是類似於類別，允許以建立使用 XML 文件的標準格式摘要簽署。This class is similar to the class, which allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 不過，類別的祖系內容排除正式的子文件。However, the class excludes ancestor context from a canonicalized subdocument. 使用類別，當您需要進行規範化 XML 子文件，使其獨立於其 XML 內容。Use the class when you need to canonicalize an XML subdocument so that it is independent from its XML context. 例如，應用程式如使用的 Web 服務簽署的 XML 中複雜的通訊協定通常需要 XML 規範化以這種方式。For example, applications such as Web services that use signed XML within complex communication protocols often need to canonicalize XML in this manner. 這類應用程式通常會將 XML 信封內各種動態建構的項目可以大幅變更文件，且會造成 XML 簽章驗證失敗。Such applications often envelop XML within various dynamically constructed elements, which can substantially change the document and cause XML signature verification to fail. 類別來排除這類的上階內容從標準的子文件，以解決這個問題。The class solves this problem by excluding such ancestor context from the canonical subdocument. 一般而言，您不會建立規範化轉換類別的新執行個體。Typically, you do not create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定規範化轉換，將說明要轉換的統一資源識別元 (URI)屬性，這是從存取屬性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes a transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要取得規範化轉換的參考，請使用屬性，這是從存取屬性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 您建立所需的規範化轉換類別的新執行個體時，才手動雜湊的 XML 文件，或使用您自己的標準化演算法。You are required to create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class only when you want to manually hash an XML document or use your own canonicalization algorithm. 描述 URI類別由定義欄位。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 描述 URI類別由定義欄位。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 如需獨佔 C14N 轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 XMLDSIG 規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。For more information about the exclusive C14N transform, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. 標準化演算法被定義在 W3C 標準 XML 規格中，將會位於 www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何簽署 XML 文件與類別使用信封簽章。The following code example shows how to sign an XML document with the class using an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigExcC14NTransform/VB/example.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying a list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`參數會包含以空白字元分隔的可規範化使用標準的標準化演算法，而不是獨佔標準化演算法的命名空間前置詞清單。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a whitespace-delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定預設命名空間，並沒有前置詞，會傳遞指定之前置詞"#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList`參數會包含以空白字元分隔的可規範化使用標準的標準化演算法，而不是獨佔標準化演算法的命名空間前置詞清單。The `inclusiveNamespacesPrefixList` parameter contains a whitespace-delimited list of namespace prefixes to canonicalize using the standard canonicalization algorithm rather than the exclusive canonicalization algorithm. 若要指定預設命名空間，並沒有前置詞，會傳遞指定之前置詞"#default"。To specify the default namespace, which does not have a prefix, pass the special prefix "#default".
